channel.title: Shop point system
channel.description: Ok here's the deal, I don't know how to do this... Never have tbh... couldn't find a tutorial on it and I went as far back as December 2009.. How would you go about.. making shops that take points instead of coins.. for example pc shop takes your pc points instead of cash... how would I make it do that.. (noob question I know blah blah)
